item.title: Toggle-Terminator
item.description: Make Terminator Terminal Act Like Guake/Yakuake Terminal in UBUNTU Many of us might have come across our favourite tools lakes some features, This is something like that turn out to be this repo that implemented a toggle functionality to the terminator. Check out the git repo : Star Install Dependencies sudo apt-get install xdotool wmctrl Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/sonus/toggle-terminator.git ~/toggle-terminator Change Directory to toggle-terminator cd ~/toggle-terminator Make the python script an executable
